item.title: co2 monitors
item.description: My latest project is a low-cost carbon dioxide monitor. Many workers at UW-Madison have been concerned about air quality on campus. The university has not been forthcoming about what effort they have devoted to assessing and improving air quality in campus classrooms, meeting rooms, and workspaces. (UW-Madison Facilities has an FAQ on HVAC that is shockingly offensive, even for a completely jaded employee.) And with the removal of the campus mask mandate at spring break last March, mask-wearing on campus has become a rarity.
